short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shaanti a bookmark extension using the Shaarli API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Shaarli browser extension using the API.
It features add/edit and search of bookmarks for your Shaarli instance.

Source code: https://codeberg.org/BinaryUnit/Shaanti
